metadata.title: CVE-2019-14975 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Artifex MuPDF before 1.16.0 has a heap-based buffer over-read infz_chartorune in fitz/string.c because pdf/pdf-op-filter.c does not checkfor a missing string.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
